text: The Assistant Director of Public Health shall be a physician, and during the absence of or disability of the Director of Public Health shall act as Director of Public Health and discharge the duties incident to that position.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 6-108.

1973 Ed., § 6-109.

Miscellaneous Notes

Office of Director of Public Health abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-101.

DC CODE § 7-172

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Assistant Director of Public Health to be physician and discharge duties of health officer during his absence or disability.
